README.md.title: Readme
README.md.content:
# @tinijs/cli **The CLI for the TiniJS framework.**
- [Install & Usage](#install-usage) - [Command overview](#cli-command-overview) - [Command reference](#cli-command-reference) - [`build`](#command-build) - [`clean`](#command-clean) - [`dev`](#command-dev) - [`docs`](#command-docs) - [`generate`](#command-generate) - [`new`](#command-new) - [`preview`](#command-preview) - [`pwa`](#command-pwa) - [`test`](#command-test) - [`help`](#command-help) - [`*`](#command-*) - [Detail API reference](https://cli-api.tinijs.dev)
## Install & Usage - Install: `npm i -g @tinijs/cli` - Create a new TiniJS project: `tini new ` - For more, please visit:

Command overview

The CLI for the TiniJS framework. - [`tini build --target [value]`](#command-build) - [`tini clean|c --includes [value] --excludes [value]`](#command-clean) - [`tini dev|serve`](#command-dev) - [`tini docs|home`](#command-docs) - [`tini generate|g|create --type-prefixed --nested`](#command-generate) - [`tini new|start --latest --skip-install --skip-git`](#command-new) - [`tini preview --port [value] --host [value] --i18n`](#command-preview) - [`tini pwa --tag [value]`](#command-pwa) - [`tini test`](#command-test) - [`tini help`](#command-help) - [`tini *`](#command-*)

Command reference

build

Build the app. **Usage:** ```sh tini build --target [value] ``` **Options:** - `-t, --target [value]`: Target: production (default), qa1, any, ...

clean

Clean Typescript output files. **Usage:** ```sh tini clean --includes [value] --excludes [value] tini c --includes [value] --excludes [value] ``` **Options:** - `-i, --includes [value]`: Including files, separated by |. - `-e, --excludes [value]`: Excluding files, separated by |.

dev

Start the dev server. **Usage:** ```sh tini dev tini serve ```

docs

Open documentation. **Usage:** ```sh tini docs tini home ```

generate

Generate a resource. **Usage:** ```sh tini generate --type-prefixed --nested tini g --type-prefixed --nested tini create --type-prefixed --nested ``` **Parameters:** - ``: The resource type - ``: The resource destination **Options:** - `-t, --type-prefixed`: Use the format [name].[type].[ext]. - `-n, --nested`: Nested under a folder.

new

Create a new project. **Usage:** ```sh tini new --latest --skip-install --skip-git tini start --latest --skip-install --skip-git ``` **Parameters:** - ``: The project name. **Options:** - `-l, --latest`: Install the latest skeleton. - `-i, --skip-install`: Do not install dependency packages. - `-g, --skip-git`: Do not initialize a git repository.

preview

Preview the app. **Usage:** ```sh tini preview --port [value] --host [value] --i18n ``` **Options:** - `-p, --port [value]`: Custom port - `-h, --host [value]`: Custom host - `-i, --i18n`: Enable i18n

pwa

Working with PWA apps. **Usage:** ```sh tini pwa --tag [value] ``` **Parameters:** - ``: The `` parameter. **Options:** - `-t, --tag [value]`: Use the custom version of @tinijs/pwa.

test

Unit test the app. **Usage:** ```sh tini test ```

help

Display help. **Usage:** ```sh tini help ```

*

Any other command is not suppoted. **Usage:** ```sh tini ```
